title: Document quarkus-app layout, including the difference between lib/boot and lib/main
body:
### Description

Document quarkus-app layout, including the difference between lib/boot and lib/main.

I was looking into differences between 3.3.3 and 3.4.2 based application and I noticed that `org.wildfly.common.wildfly-common-1.5.4.Final-format-001.jar` moved from `lib/boot` to `lib/main` with 3.4.
I wasn't able to find any documentation that would hint me if jars from both dirs are used or just lib/main get used in the end.

I also checked META-INF/MANIFEST.MF from target/quarkus-app/quarkus-run.jar and it points just to lib/boot entries. And jconsole/visualvm report just quarkus-run.jar.
So I had to ask the people from dev team to understand that jars from both directories are used by the app in runtime.

It would be good to have quarkus-app layout, including the difference between lib/boot and lib/main.
